metadata.title: CVE-2021-47121 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net: caif: fix memory leak in cfusbl_device_notifyIn case of caif_enroll_dev() fail, allocatedlink_support won't be assigned to the correspondingstructure. So simply free allocated pointer in caseof error.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
